related.meaning: untuk menghabiskan, untuk kehabisan; untuk mengabdikan, untuk melayani

lessons.japanese: 奴の悪運が尽きるのも時間の問題だ。
lessons.indonesian: It's just a matter of time before his outrageous and undeserved good luck comes to an end.

lessons.japanese: お前には全く愛想が尽きる。
lessons.indonesian: I'm quite out of patience with you.

lessons.japanese: 遅かれ早かれ、彼の運は尽きるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Sooner or later, his luck will run out.

lessons.japanese: 早晩彼の運は尽きるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Sooner or later, he will run out of luck.

lessons.japanese: 早晩彼の運は尽きるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Sooner or later, his luck will run out.

lessons.japanese: 私はお金が尽きるまでここにいるつもりです。
lessons.indonesian: I plan to stay here until my money gives out.

lessons.japanese: 私はお金が尽きるまでここにいるつもりです。
lessons.indonesian: I plan to stay here until my money runs out.

lessons.japanese: 私はお金が尽きるまでここにいるつもりです。
lessons.indonesian: I plan to stay here until I run out of money.

lessons.indonesian: It's just a matter of time before his outrageous and undeserved good luck comes to an end.

lessons.indonesian: Sooner or later, he will run out of luck.
